Field Detail

FLEXI_QUESTION

static final int FLEXI_QUESTION
Indicates that this question is a flexi-question. A flexi-question is of the standard Ingatan 2.0 type. It has a text field for the question text, a text field for the answer text (which includes answer fields) and a text field for the post-answer text.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

TABLE_QUESTION

static final int TABLE_QUESTION
Indicates that this question is a table-question. This question type is ideal for vocabulary training, and that sort of thing. It is more a flash-card style set-up. The user enter data into two columns of a table, and can choose to have the question side and answer side reversible, as well as how the questions should be asked, e.g. multiple choice or written.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

OTHER_QUESTION

static final int OTHER_QUESTION
Indicates that this question is of a type developed later on. If the question is of this type, then use the getQuestionTypeName method to retreive a string description of this question.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Method Detail

getQuestionType

int getQuestionType()
Gets the question type. Compare with one of the class fields: FLEXI_QUESTION, TABLE_QUESTION, or OTHER_QUESTION.

Returns:
the question type integer.

getQuestionTypeName

java.lang.String getQuestionTypeName()
Gets a string descriptiong of this question type.

Returns:
a string descriptiong of this question type.

getSearchableRepresentation

java.lang.String getSearchableRepresentation()
Gets a single string representation of the content of this question which can be used by external search methods.

Returns:
a signle string representation of the content of this question.
